Room.Name: Pits of Doom - Orange Level
Room.ShortDescription: You have foolishly entered the Pits of Doom Orange Level.
Room.LongDescription: As you work your way down to the Pits of Doom, you can feel the heat rising and your adrenaline kicking in. This level is exclusively dominated by metallic dragons. You can hear them moving around and see flashes of fire from their nostrils in the dim light. It's a hard climb going up or down. Don't you wish you had some climbing equipment? On the other hand, it might not be advisable to go any further down.
